title: Haven't received Riot Kayle skin.
body:
It is currently 11:49 pm of the 30th and i've yet to receive the riot kayle skin, although i received the icon 6 days ago could you check out why? Thanks.

Also I went to the support page before i got the generic rioter response to go do that, we can't that support article is blocked so we can't view it here are the screenshots for proof.

https://gyazo.com/d641f347ec25fc4e3936db307aa4aab2

replies.body:
We're taking care of the few players who we accidentally missed with the gifting process in [support tickets](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). I recommend submitting one so we can take care of you. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
Same!! I received the icon but not the skin!
